title: AI Zero to Hero Week 1: Fear of missing out on the AI train and what I'm doing about it
description: I kept procrastinating learning ML because I either thought I was too late or not smart enough... Time to stop that.

title: Using ChatGPT to make a Pok√©mon theme of my favorite card game
description: ChatGPT is really great at some things but at other times, it's so incompetent that I feel like giving up

title: What to do when an airline website doesn't accept your legal name
description: Southwest usually has good customer service... but in this case it's completely broken, I can't fix it myself, and the company has no plans of fixing it

title: When should you give up on a project that doesn't work?
description: I spent most of my free time after work over the last month working on a project and today I'm giving up.

title: Who actually even uses is-odd and is-even?
description: People love to make fun of Javascript dependency bloat by talking about packages like is-even and is-odd but that got me wondering... Who actually uses them?

title: Why are Hard Drives called "Drives"?
description: Punch card, floppy disks, compact discs, etc. They all focus on the form factor. So why are hard drives called "drives"? credits: Thumbnail photo by Stockio.com
